content:
We don't have a Tools Tab. Sounds like you mean the Unified Toolbar? Please see https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/getting-started-thunderbird-main-window-supernova for description of the UI.

> I can no longer delete tagged emails on mass.

Please give step by step instructions of your delete process.
creator: wsmwk

content: Under View/Layout, enable the Message List Header, then click the Quick Filter icon, and then the button to only show tagged messages.
creator: sfhowes

content: Het is niet eenvoudig, maar zoals u hier kunt lezen zou het wel moeten kunnen: https://support.mozilla.org/nl/questions/1471439
creator: markh2

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content: 1. Versione di Thunderbirds 128.12 0esr (64 bit) 2. Versione del sistema operativo MacOS Monterey 3- Providere delle caselle email Aruba 4. Tipologia di account POP3 5. Estensioni installate credo nulla 6. Nessun messaggio di errore, continua solamente a scaricare mail gi√† scaricate 7. Nessun software di sicurezza
creator: barbara.lop

content:
Negli account POP3 il problema che segnali potrebbe avere due cause: - danneggiamento dei file del profilo - errata comunicazione dei messaggi in attesa da parte del server

Solo la prima dipende da Thunderbird. Prova a fare queste operazioni di manutenzione:

  1. Fare un backup integrale del profilo -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/profili-thunderbird#w_effettuare-una-copia-di-sicurezza-del-profilo
  2. Compattare le cartelle -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/compattazione-cartelle
  3. Riavviare Thunderbird
  4. Se il problema non √® risolto, ricostruire l'indice globale -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/ricostruzione-indice-globale
  5. Riavviare Thunderbird
  6. Se il problema non si √® ancora risolto: click destro sulla cartella che contiene le mail doppie -> Propriet√† -> [Ripara la cartella]
  1. Se neppure questo risolve, prova ad eliminare il file popstate.dat come spiegato qui -> https://kb.mozillazine.org/Popstate.dat Tutta la posta ancora sul server verr√† scaricata nuovamente, ma poi dovrebbe riprendere a funzionare normalmente.

Lo ripeto per sicurezza: fai prima di tutto un backup!
creator: @next

content: Mogelijk ziet de ontvangende server het bericht als ongewenst, u kunt het beste de betreffende ontvanger(s) vragen hun spammappen te controleren. Als het bericht van u uit normaal wordt verzonden, is er weinig wat u aan uw kant kunt doen.
creator: markh2

content:
Toto je odpovƒõƒè od ChatGPT (AI):

Tady je ovƒõ≈ôen√Ω n√°vod, jak ≈ôe≈°it probl√©m **"nenalezen odpov√≠daj√≠c√≠ certifik√°t"** po aktualizaci Thunderbirdu (nap≈ô. verze 140.0.1):

---

    1. üîß Krok 1: Ovƒõ≈ôte, ≈æe m√°te importovan√Ω certifik√°t s priv√°tn√≠m kl√≠ƒçem

1. Z√≠skejte sv≈Øj soubor certifik√°tu ve form√°tu **PKCS#12** (‚Äû.p12‚Äú nebo ‚Äû.pfx‚Äú), kter√Ω obsahuje **v√°s, priv√°tn√≠ kl√≠ƒç i certifik√°t ovƒõ≈ôovac√≠ autority (CA)**. 2. V Thunderbirdu jdƒõte do: **Nastaven√≠ √∫ƒçtu ‚Üí End-to‚ÄëEnd ≈°ifrov√°n√≠ ‚Üí Spravovat S/MIME certifik√°ty**. 3. V z√°lo≈æce **‚ÄûVa≈°e certifik√°ty‚Äú** kliknƒõte **Import**, vyberte tento soubor a zadejte heslo. ([SSL.com][1], [kb.mozillazine.org][2], [SSL.com][3]) 4. V z√°lo≈æce **Autority** se ujistƒõte, ≈æe je importov√°n certifik√°t va≈°√≠ CA (pokud je v√°≈° certifik√°t podeps√°n autoritou, ne s√°m sebou).

---

    1. üõ†Ô∏è Krok 2: P≈ôipravte kompletn√≠ certifik√°tov√Ω ≈ôetƒõzec

Pokud Thunderbird st√°le *nenajde* odpov√≠daj√≠c√≠ certifik√°t:

  • P≈ôi vytv√°≈ôen√≠ `.p12` souboru exportujte **ve≈°ker√Ω ≈ôetƒõzec**, nejen sv≈Øj, ale i intermedi√°rn√≠ certifik√°ty.
  • Pou≈æijte p≈ô√≠kaz (pokud pou≈æ√≠v√°te `openssl`):

```bash openssl pkcs12 -export \ 

 -in myname_public.crt \  -inkey myname_private.key \  -certfile public_chain.crt \  -out my_SMIME_cert.p12

```

T√≠m zajist√≠te, ≈æe Thunderbird ‚Äúvid√≠‚Äù i pot≈ôebn√© meziƒçl√°nky certifik√°tu .

---

    1. ‚ôªÔ∏è Krok 3: ‚ÄúZadejte‚Äù certifik√°t do nastaven√≠ √∫ƒçtu

1. Jdƒõte do **Nastaven√≠ √∫ƒçtu ‚Üí End‚Äëto-End ≈°ifrov√°n√≠**. 2. U va≈°eho e‚Äëmailu vyberte **Vybrat‚Ä¶** pro digit√°ln√≠ podepisov√°n√≠ a ≈°ifrov√°n√≠. 3. Vyberte spr√°vn√Ω certifik√°t (nyn√≠ by tam mƒõl b√Ωt), potvrƒète v√Ωbƒõr. ([SSL.com][1])

---

    1. üß© Krok 4: Kontrola fungov√°n√≠
  • Napi≈°te testovac√≠ e‚Äëmail a ho elektronicky podepi≈°te.
  • Thunderbird by ji≈æ nemƒõl hl√°sit chybƒõj√≠c√≠ certifik√°t.
  • M≈Ø≈æete tak√© zkontrolovat, ≈æe e‚Äëmail je podepsan√Ω i na stranƒõ p≈ô√≠jemce.

---

    1. üí° Extra tip (na probl√©my s SHA‚Äë1)

Pokud se v√°m objev√≠ hl√°≈°ka jako ‚ÄûSignature not valid‚Äú kv≈Øli pou≈æit√≠ **star≈°√≠ho SHA‚Äë1** algoritmu, m≈Ø≈æete (ale jen pokud opravdu pot≈ôebujete) otev≈ô√≠t **Config Editor**, naj√≠t `mail.smime.accept_insecure_sha1_message_signatures` a nastavit hodnotu na **`true`**. T√≠m umo≈æn√≠te p≈ôij√≠mat SHA‚Äë1 podpisy ([Reddit][4]).

---

      1. ‚úÖ Shrnut√≠

| Probl√©m | ≈òe≈°en√≠ | | ------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | Chyb√≠ certifik√°t v Thunderbirdu | Importujte `.p12` s priv√°tn√≠m kl√≠ƒçem do sekce **Va≈°e certifik√°ty**. | | üîí Certifik√°t bez CA ≈ôetƒõzce | Exportujte `.p12` i s CA chain (pomoc√≠ `openssl` a `certfile`). | | ‚ùó ≈†patn√Ω v√Ωbƒõr v nastaven√≠ | Ujistƒõte se, ≈æe je v End‚Äëto‚ÄëEnd ≈°ifrov√°n√≠ vybran√Ω **spr√°vn√Ω certifik√°t**. | | üçÇ Star√Ω SHA‚Äë1 podpis zobrazuje chybu | M≈Ø≈æete povolit `mail.smime.accept_insecure_sha1_message_signatures = true` (volitelnƒõ). | ---

J√° bych je≈°tƒõ zkusil vypnout (pokud pou≈æ√≠v√°≈°) newindowsovsk√Ω antivir√°k.

content: Odpovƒõƒè ne≈ôe≈°√≠ m≈Øj probl√©m. Nepou≈æ√≠v√°m kvalifikovan√Ω certifik√°t s priv√°tn√≠m kl√≠ƒçem ulo≈æen√Ωm v poƒç√≠taƒçi. Pou≈æ√≠v√°m Priv√°tn√≠ kl√≠ƒç na za≈ô√≠zen√≠ QSCD (Qualified Signature Creation Device). Thunderbird pou≈æ√≠v√°m s t√≠mto nastaven√≠m mnoho let. Probl√©m je a≈æ ve verzi 140.0.1esr. Podle v≈°eho to vypad√°, ≈æe Thunderbird chce podepisovat odes√≠lan√Ω email certifik√°tem OpenPGP, p≈ôesto≈æe nen√≠ v Thuderbirdu ≈æ√°dn√Ω takov√Ω certifik√°t nastaven. Nebo l√©pe ≈ôeƒçeno, pokud chci odeslat email s kvalifikovan√Ωm podpisem s priv√°tn√≠m kl√≠ƒçem na za≈ô√≠zen√≠ QSCD , pak se v hlaviƒçce odes√≠lan√©ho emailu objev√≠ ≈æe bude odesl√°n priv√°tn√≠ kl√≠ƒç OpenPGP a pak odesl√°n√≠ sel≈æe, proto≈æe v Thunderbirdu ≈æ√°dn√Ω takov√Ω kl√≠ƒç nen√≠,

content:
Znovu jsem to p≈ôedhodil AI:

Pokud ve Thunderbird dost√°v√°te chybu **‚Äûnenalezen opov√≠daj√≠c√≠ certifik√°t‚Äú**, znamen√° to, ≈æe program nem≈Ø≈æe naj√≠t spr√°vn√Ω certifik√°t, kter√Ω je pot≈ôeba pro de≈°ifrov√°n√≠ nebo ovƒõ≈ôen√≠ digit√°ln√≠ho podpisu zpr√°vy.

Tato chyba m≈Ø≈æe nastat z nƒõkolika d≈Øvod≈Ø, a pojƒème se pod√≠vat na mo≈æn√© p≈ô√≠ƒçiny a ≈ôe≈°en√≠:

      1. Mo≈æn√© p≈ô√≠ƒçiny:

1. **Certifik√°t byl ztracen nebo vypr≈°el** 

  Pokud certifik√°t, kter√Ω pou≈æ√≠v√°te pro podepisov√°n√≠ nebo ≈°ifrov√°n√≠, vypr≈°el nebo byl odstranƒõn (nap≈ô√≠klad po aktualizaci syst√©mu), Thunderbird nebude schopen tento certifik√°t naj√≠t a pou≈æ√≠t. 
  **≈òe≈°en√≠**:   Zkontrolujte, jestli m√°te certifik√°t st√°le nainstalov√°n a zda nen√≠ neplatn√Ω. M≈Ø≈æete to udƒõlat takto: 
  * Otev≈ôete Thunderbird.   * P≈ôejdƒõte do **Nastaven√≠** ‚Üí **S/MIME**.   * Zkontrolujte seznam certifik√°t≈Ø, kter√© m√°te nainstalovan√©, a ovƒõ≈ôte, zda v√°≈° certifik√°t pro ≈°ifrov√°n√≠ a podpisy je st√°le aktivn√≠.

2. **Chyb√≠ p≈ô√≠stup k priv√°tn√≠mu kl√≠ƒçi na QSCD za≈ô√≠zen√≠** 

  Pokud pou≈æ√≠v√°te za≈ô√≠zen√≠ QSCD pro ulo≈æen√≠ priv√°tn√≠ho kl√≠ƒçe, m≈Ø≈æe b√Ωt probl√©m v tom, ≈æe Thunderbird nem≈Ø≈æe spr√°vnƒõ komunikovat s t√≠mto za≈ô√≠zen√≠m. Nap≈ô√≠klad za≈ô√≠zen√≠ m≈Ø≈æe b√Ωt odpojen√©, nebo software pro komunikaci s QSCD za≈ô√≠zen√≠m (nap≈ô. ovladaƒçe nebo middleware) m≈Ø≈æe b√Ωt po aktualizaci nekompatibiln√≠. 
  **≈òe≈°en√≠**: 
  * Ujistƒõte se, ≈æe va≈°e QSCD za≈ô√≠zen√≠ je spr√°vnƒõ p≈ôipojeno a komunikace s n√≠m funguje.   * Zkontrolujte, zda m√°te nainstalovan√Ω spr√°vn√Ω software pro podporu QSCD za≈ô√≠zen√≠ (nap≈ô. ovladaƒçe nebo aplikace, kter√© umo≈æ≈àuj√≠ komunikaci mezi Thunderbirdem a va≈°√≠m QSCD za≈ô√≠zen√≠m).   * Nƒõkdy m≈Ø≈æe pomoci restartovat poƒç√≠taƒç nebo zkusit za≈ô√≠zen√≠ p≈ôipojit k jin√©mu portu USB.

3. **Probl√©m s konfigurac√≠ Thunderbird** 

  Po aktualizaci na novou verzi Thunderbirdu m≈Ø≈æe doj√≠t k probl√©m≈Øm s konfigurac√≠ nebo kompatibilitou. Nov√° verze mohla zmƒõnit zp≈Øsob, jak√Ωm Thunderbird pracuje s certifik√°ty nebo zp≈Øsob komunikace se za≈ô√≠zen√≠mi pro elektronick√© podpisy. 
  **≈òe≈°en√≠**: 
  * Zkuste se vr√°tit k p≈ôedchoz√≠ verzi Thunderbirdu, pokud to jde.   * Zkontrolujte, zda m√°te spr√°vnƒõ nakonfigurovan√Ω certifik√°t a priv√°tn√≠ kl√≠ƒç v Thunderbirdu podle tƒõchto krok≈Ø: 
    1. P≈ôejdƒõte na **Nastaven√≠ √∫ƒçtu**.     2. Vyberte sv≈Øj emailov√Ω √∫ƒçet a pak kliknƒõte na **S/MIME**.     3. Ujistƒõte se, ≈æe je vybran√Ω spr√°vn√Ω certifik√°t pro ≈°ifrov√°n√≠ a digit√°ln√≠ podpisy.

4. **Nastaven√≠ na serveru nebo probl√©my s certifik√°tem p≈ô√≠jemce** 

  Pokud se v√°m tato chyba objevuje pouze u urƒçit√©ho p≈ô√≠jemce, m≈Ø≈æe b√Ωt probl√©m na jeho stranƒõ. M≈Ø≈æe b√Ωt, ≈æe p≈ô√≠jemce nem√° spr√°vnƒõ nainstalovan√Ω sv≈Øj certifik√°t nebo pou≈æ√≠v√° certifik√°t, kter√Ω ji≈æ nen√≠ platn√Ω. 
  **≈òe≈°en√≠**:   Zkuste ovƒõ≈ôit, jestli p≈ô√≠jemce spr√°vnƒõ pou≈æ√≠v√° S/MIME a zda m√° aktu√°ln√≠ certifik√°t pro ≈°ifrov√°n√≠ a podpisy. M≈Ø≈æete se tak√© ujistit, ≈æe m√°te spr√°vn√Ω ve≈ôejn√Ω certifik√°t p≈ô√≠jemce.
      1. Co d√°l?

Pokud v≈°echny v√Ω≈°e uveden√© mo≈ænosti nevy≈ôe≈°√≠ probl√©m, m≈Ø≈æe b√Ωt dobr√©:

  • Zkontrolovat, zda nen√≠ probl√©m s aktualizacemi a zda nen√≠ k dispozici oprava nebo nov√° verze Thunderbirdu.
  • P≈ô√≠padnƒõ kontaktovat podporu Mozilly, pokud m√°te podez≈ôen√≠ na probl√©m s konkr√©tn√≠ verz√≠ Thunderbirdu.

--- PS: Tady nen√≠ podpora Mozilly, je to jen F√≥rum u≈æivatel≈Ø.

Glob√°lna datab√°za je indexovac√≠ syst√©m umo≈æ≈àuj√∫c√≠ Thunderbirdu vyhƒæad√°va≈• v zpr√°vach. Znovuvytvorenie glob√°lnej datab√°zy preindexuje spr√°vy a vizitky z adres√°ra. (Spr√°vy z konferenci√≠ nie s√∫ indexovan√©.)

Postup znovuvytvorenia glob√°lnej datab√°zy: - Ukonƒçite Thunderbird. - Vyhƒæadajte vo svojom profile Thunderbirdu s√∫bor global-messages-db.sqlite - Odstr√°≈àte tento s√∫bor. - Spustite Thunderbird. Automaticky sa zaƒçne proces vytv√°rania indexu. V z√°vislosti na poƒçte spr√°v m√¥≈æe index√°cia trva≈• dos≈• dlh√Ω ƒças. Poƒças index√°cie m√¥≈æete Thunderbird pou≈æ√≠vat, iba bude zn√≠≈æen√Ω jeho v√Ωkon a vyhƒæad√°vania prines√∫ iba ƒçiastoƒçn√© v√Ωsledky, alebo dokonca ≈æiadne. Proces index√°cie m√¥≈æete sledova≈• v Spr√°vcovi aktiv√≠t (ponuka N√°stroje > Spr√°vca ƒçinnosti).

content: Thunderbird does not have a size limit.
creator: davidsk

content: Hi, David what I meant by size is the file size in NTFS whenever the Mbox file reaches high space what does TP do or should I just work with maildir?
creator: amir.maher0

content: I am not familiar with maildir or NTFS, but Thunderbird does not, to my knowledge, have size restrictions. Also, your 30 accounts would be 30 mbox files, not one.
creator: davidsk

content: one of the accounts can reach more than 40 and 50 giga every 6 maybe 7 months so, the single MBOX file for the single mail will eventually reach more than what windows OS supports any idea what to do around this?
creator: amir.maher0

content: To me, you seem to be reaching a possibility of a dedicated server. I say that, only because a major issue is having the resource power to funnel all those accounts through thunderbird. speed and fast networking become paramount. A downside of mbox is that the need to periodically compress could easily, for the short term, double the storage requirements. So, maildir seems a better alternative to what is not a good environment to start with. My understanding is that Maildir may not be as stable in Thunderbird as is mbox. https://kb.mozillazine.org/Limits_-_Thunderbird may provide more info. AND, I am NOT an expert in this. My comments are from my experienc in working with email, both private and corporate - and I am a novice on the technical aspects.
creator: davidsk

content:
how will Thunderbird handles file size if it's using one file (MBOX)

It's one mbox file per folder, and not one mbox file for everything. Obviously the risk for mail file corruption becomes greater when Inbox files reach tens of gigabytes in size. However, if this is supposed to run on Windows, I'd be much more worried about mail file corruption caused by anti-virus software. So make sure to create an exception in your anti-virus software for the Thunderbird profile folder. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/profiles-where-thunderbird-stores-user-data#w_how-do-i-find-my-profile

Also, use the archiving feature to keep the Inbox as tidy as possible. This helps to spread the large no. of messages across multiple folders. https://support.mozilla.org/kb/archived-messages
creator: christ1

content: Thank you all for your answers My issue is that due to the nature of the end user's work he will have to keep mails indefinitely which I's quite sure that even single MBOX file per mailbox is never going to be enough due to sizing issues that's why I don't think that single MBOX can handle our entire work unless if TP can use that MBOX as an offline file to access old mails something like outlook and PST files if you know what I mean!!

content:
Hello,

I am currently using the Deepin Linux distribution, and I installed Thunderbird via the system‚Äôs built-in software repository. As shown in the screenshot, the Thunderbird version is 102.15.1, which is very outdated.

I attempted to install Thunderbird using Flathub, but encountered an error. On the Flathub website, it does not indicate support for the aarch64 architecture. I am very concerned about this, as the issue highlights a broader problem that may exist across various Linux distributions.

For example, I also encountered the same issue on a Debian system when using the local mirror source recommended by Debian.

Therefore, I believe Mozilla should consider adding support for aarch64 on Flathub, so that users can more easily access the latest version of Thunderbird in a timely manner.
creator: xujie0739

content:
Hello there

You can be right on that point there.

Deepin Linux software 25 is that good friendly software. Yes, this software could be updated to a higher version if you are using that lower version of it with some system update tools that are available for Linux deepin 25 in 2025.

Solutions to fix.  ;(it might be a fix but blocking errors can block that option to do that as you describe that in text). Type  ; flatpak update(to update all apps.) Or to update all apps : flatpak update org.mozilla.Thunderbird(to update only Thunderbird).

Or You can try to delete that flatpak and update or reinstall that flatpack again. Other ways are there and say update everything on that pc but is that a common solution?

There are other ways to get that new updated Thunderbird version into Linux by using other apps.(it might be a solution but it is not recommended by us) Try to use Thunderbird appImage. But there is that new problem again it is not an official app.



Greetings googlethunderbird.

content:
I do not know Mac, but I did a quick web search and found this AI solution. I hope it works for you.

Changing Desktop Icons on Mac Steps to Change Icons 

   Find a New Icon        Search for an image online or use one saved on your computer.        Supported formats include .JPG, .PNG, and .SVG. 
   Copy the New Icon        Right-click the image and select "Copy."        If using Preview, click "Edit" and then "Copy." 
   Access the Get Info Menu        Locate the app, folder, or file on your desktop.        Right-click it and select "Get Info." 
   Replace the Icon        Click the current icon in the Get Info window to highlight it.        Press Command + V to paste the new icon.        The icon should change immediately.

Restoring the Original Icon 

   If you want to revert to the original icon, open the Get Info menu again, click the icon, and press the Delete key.

Creating Shortcuts (Aliases) Steps to Create a Shortcut 

   Locate the File or Folder        Use Finder to find the file, folder, or application. 
   Create an Alias        Go to File > Make Alias or right-click and select "Make Alias."        Alternatively, press Control + Command + A. 
   Move the Alias to Desktop        Drag the alias to your desktop for easy access.        You can rename it by selecting the alias and pressing Enter.

These steps will help you customize your desktop icons and create shortcuts for quick access on your Mac.
